title: Decentralized Voting System
description: Blockchain voting app with secure smart contracts using Solidity, React.js, Node.js, Truffle, and SQL for transparent and tamper-proof elections.

title: AI Medical Diagnostic Assistant
description: Symptom analysis via ML using Python, TensorFlow, and Streamlit for intelligent medical diagnosis assistance.

title: Smart Home Monitoring System
description: IoT dashboard using Firebase and sensor data for real-time home monitoring with React.js frontend.

title: AI Study Companion
description: Adaptive learning tool using React.js, Node.js, Firebase, and OpenAI API for personalized education assistance.

title: Event Ticketing DApp
description: NFT-based secure ticketing system using Solidity, Hardhat, IPFS, and ethers.js for blockchain-powered event management.
